import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Form, Button, Table, Alert } from 'react-bootstrap'; const Billing = () => { const [billType, setBillType] = useState('service'); // 'service' or 'parts' const [selectedItems, setSelectedItems] = useState([]); const serviceItems = [ { id: 1, name: 'Oil Change', price: 85, type: 'service' }, { id: 2, name: 'Brake Service', price: 120, type: 'service' }, { id: 3, name: 'Engine Tune-up', price: 150, type: 'service' } ]; const partsItems = [ { id: 101, name: 'Engine Oil', price: 25, type: 'part' }, { id: 102, name: 'Air Filter', price: 15, type: 'part' }, { id: 103, name: 'Spark Plugs', price: 45, type: 'part' } ]; const addToBill = (item) => { setSelectedItems([...selectedItems, { ...item, quantity: 1 }]); }; const calculateTotal = () => { return selectedItems.reduce((total, item) => total + (item.price * item.quantity), 0); }; return (

)} ); }; export default Billing;
